entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023
